column4: hi folks. google chrome on ubuntu 12.04.1. is there a way to change the default size of the "edit bookmarks" window? everytime i click on the star to change the bookmark folder, i feel like the "edit bookmarks" window is kind of small. tks!
url->  " chome-urls://bookmarks " << you can set that as a new tabpage in the settings
chrome://chrome-urls/ << i'm just showing off now :)
